display_long_description:
Step into a world where curiosity may just be your downfall. Cat Horror is a spine-chilling VR game that combines mystery, puzzles, and atmospheric horror, all centered around the enigmatic behavior of your feline companions.

After discovering an ancient, cursed book titled “The Cat Horror Chronicles,” your once-peaceful home begins to transform. Shadows shift, walls creak, and your cats—once playful and innocent—start acting strange. They stare at empty corners, disappear into impossible spaces, and even seem to guide or mislead you as you navigate this eerie, otherworldly environment.

Gameplay Features:

Immersive Exploration: Investigate a beautifully haunting VR environment, from dimly lit rooms to surreal, shifting dreamscapes.
Challenging Puzzles: Solve intricate puzzles that unlock new areas and reveal the dark secrets of the cursed book.
Paranormal Encounters: Face ghostly, shadowy cats that may help or hinder your journey, depending on how you interact with them.
Horror Atmosphere: Experience a blend of psychological horror and suspense, with dynamic lighting, immersive audio, and unexpected surprises.
